stories.Title: Between real and virtual
stories.Description: Imagine a universal simulator that replicates real-world interactions using a diverse range of datasets. That's UniSim, this innovative approach is set to revolutionize gaming, robotics, and more.
stories.Tweet: Between real and virtual 📦 Imagine a universal simulator that replicates real-world interactions using a diverse range of datasets. That's UniSim, this innovative approach is set to revolutionize gaming, robotics, and more. #science https://universal-simulator.github.io/unisim/

stories.Title: Not your ordinary pup
stories.Description: Scientists at Berkeley Lab have developed a robotic canine named Spot, equipped with sensors capable of mapping radiation in real-time, opening new doors to nuclear safety and emergency response.
stories.Tweet: Not your ordinary pup 📦 Scientists at Berkeley Lab have developed a robotic canine named Spot, equipped with sensors capable of mapping radiation in real-time, opening new doors to nuclear safety and emergency response. #robotics https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/meet-spot-the-robot-dog-that-is-helping-map-radiation

stories.Title: From space to your phone
stories.Description: Connectivity is reaching new heights with SpaceX's latest offering, "Starlink Direct to Cell," which promises text, voice, and data service via satellite for existing LTE phones, starting in 2024.
stories.Tweet: From space to your phone 📦 Connectivity is reaching new heights with SpaceX's latest offering, "Starlink Direct to Cell," which promises text, voice, and data service via satellite for existing LTE phones, starting in 2024. #spacex https://www.theverge.com/2023/10/12/23914081/spacex-starlink-direct-to-cell-satellite-internet-lte-connectivity

stories.Title: Cost-effective progress
stories.Description: OpenAI's mission to democratize AI development continues with the introduction of tools that could further enhance the cost-effectiveness of their AI models, a major benefit for developers.
stories.Tweet: Cost-effective progress 📦 OpenAI's mission to democratize AI development continues with the introduction of tools that could further enhance the cost-effectiveness of their AI models, a major benefit for developers. #ai https://www.techtimes.com/articles/297452/20231012/openai-launch-major-updates-make-ai-software-development-cheaper.htm

stories.Title: Empire state of AI
stories.Description: New York's tech landscape is evolving rapidly, with AI leading the way. The city is ready to welcome a series of AI-focused events, highlighting its potential as a tech hub for diverse industries.
stories.Tweet: Empire state of AI 📦 New York's tech landscape is evolving rapidly, with AI leading the way. The city is ready to welcome a series of AI-focused events, highlighting its potential as a tech hub for diverse industries. #ai https://www.axios.com/2023/10/12/new-york-ai-world-capital

stories.Title: Driving the future
stories.Description: Innovation is arriving in the automotive software world courtesy of General Motors. The automaker has unveiled "uServices," an API for software developers that promotes cross-brand collaboration.
stories.Tweet: Driving the future 📦 Innovation is arriving in the automotive software world courtesy of General Motors. The automaker has unveiled "uServices," an API for software developers that promotes cross-brand collaboration. #electricvehicles https://www.theverge.com/2023/10/12/23914060/gm-uservices-api-software-apps-car-sdv

stories.Title: A customized touch
stories.Description: Tesla's wrapping trend has come full circle, and it's now available for Model 3 and Model Y. The "self-healing urethane-based film" has various colors, bringing style and protection to your car.
stories.Tweet: A customized touch 📦 Tesla's wrapping trend has come full circle, and it's now available for Model 3 and Model Y. The "self-healing urethane-based film" has various colors, bringing style and protection to your car. #tesla https://techcrunch.com/2023/10/11/tesla-now-sells-8000-vinyl-wraps-hinting-at-a-clever-cybertruck-solution/

stories.Title: Kia’s powerful addition
stories.Description: Kia is broadening its EV lineup with a focus on affordability and accessibility, as showcased during their recent EV Day event, where they introduced the impressive EV5 SUV.
stories.Tweet: Kia’s powerful addition 📦 Kia is broadening its EV lineup with a focus on affordability and accessibility, as showcased during their recent EV Day event, where they introduced the impressive EV5 SUV. #electricvehicles https://www.engadget.com/kia-debuts-the-ev5-suv-alongside-two-new-affordable-electric-concepts-122040979.html

stories.Title: Hope for clear skies
stories.Description: Well, we can't say we weren't warned. Bad weather has unfortunately delayed NASA's Psyche mission, which was scheduled for today. Now, they're aiming for a Friday launch.
stories.Tweet: Hope for clear skies 📦 Well, we can't say we weren't warned. Bad weather has unfortunately delayed NASA's Psyche mission, which was scheduled for today. Now, they're aiming for a Friday launch. #rocketscience https://www.space.com/nasa-psyche-spacex-falcon-heavy-launch-delay-weather

stories.Title: Apple's next move
stories.Description: Rumors about the release of Apple's M3 MacBook have come and gone. Insiders initially pointed to a 2023 launch, but it now appears we must wait until 2024.
stories.Tweet: Apple's next move 📦 Rumors about the release of Apple's M3 MacBook have come and gone. Insiders initially pointed to a 2023 launch, but it now appears we must wait until 2024. #apple https://gizmodo.com/apples-m3-macbooks-probably-wont-arrive-until-2024-1850921264

title: Introducing UniSim, AI's big city dreams, Psyche's journey is delayed
description: The bridge between the real and virtual world is shrinking with UniSim, a universal simulator used for training in various domains such as gaming and robotics. The city that never sleeps is becoming a regular home for artificial intelligence, as experts suggest that most AI companies should establish a presence in New York. On the other hand, there's some unfortunate news: NASA's Psyche mission was delayed due to bad weather. Hopefully, the sun will shine tomorrow.
